-const API_URL = 'https://test-rboi54p4y-exoessai123456-designs-projects.vercel.app/api/auth';
+const API_URL = 'https://curl 'https://mvp-frontend-b4w945iw3-exoessai123456-designs-projects.vercel.app/test-pnsa8dopc-exoessai123456-designs-projects.vercel.app/api/auth/login' \
+  -H 'accept: */*' \
+  -H 'accept-language: fr-FR,fr;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7' \
+  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
+  -H 'origin: https://mvp-frontend-b4w945iw3-exoessai123456-designs-projects.vercel.app' \
+  -H 'priority: u=1, i' \
+  -H 'referer: https://mvp-frontend-b4w945iw3-exoessai123456-designs-projects.vercel.app/' \
+  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Not;A=Brand";v="99", "Google Chrome";v="139", "Chromium";v="139"' \
+  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
+  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
+  -H 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \
+  -H 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \
+  -H 'sec-fetch-site: same-origin' \
+  -H 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
+  --data-raw '{"email":"exoessai123456@gmail.com","password":"admin123"}'/api/auth';
 
 export default function LoginForm() {
   const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
   const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
